li.label: drank awful wine
li.description: I can't believe I just drank that. The sour taste still lingers, and my stomach feels unsettled. What was that supposed to be, vinegar?

li.label: drank poor wine
li.description: Not the best I’ve had. It’s bitter and barely drinkable. I guess it'll do if nothing else is around, but I can feel a headache coming on already.

li.label: drank wine
li.description: This is passable. It doesn’t excite the senses, but it’s smooth enough to enjoy.

li.label: drank good wine
li.description: Ah, this wine is quite pleasant. The flavors blend nicely, and I can feel a comfortable buzz setting in.

li.label: drank excellent wine
li.description: Now this is what wine is supposed to taste like! Each sip is a delight. I feel my mind clearing, and everything seems just a little more vibrant.

li.label: drank masterwork wine
li.description: Absolutely exquisite. The depth of flavor is extraordinary, and I can feel my body relaxing, as if every worry is drifting away.

li.label: drank legendary wine
li.description: I've never tasted anything like this before. It’s as though the very essence of joy has been captured in liquid form.

li.label: twisting pain
li.description: This wicked concoction set my insides on fire! It hurts all over!
